front.title: IPv6 Deployment in Internet Exchange Points (IXPs)

abstract.t: This document provides a description of IPv6 deployment in Internet Exchange Points (IXP). It includes information about the switch fabric configuration, the addressing plan options and general organizational tasks to be performed. IXP are mainly a layer 2 device (a switching fabric) and in many case the best recommendations state that the IPv6 data, control and management should not be handled differently than in IPv4.
